name: Forced Attraction
description:
Forced Attraction is a game about love and stuff.

You are cupid and you must use your powers to help two helpless lovers find each other without dying.

Click over stuff to shoot your arrows.

CREDITS:
  • Rodrigo Pérez freakrho.com [Programming]
  • Juan Lagisquet [Game Design, Programming, Level design]
  • Matias Soboredo @MatiasSoboredo [2D art, 3D art, Level design]
  • Ezequiel Fuentes [2D art, 3D art, Level design]
  • Nahuel Burdisso [Programming, Level design]
